title: Problem with casting spells
body: So when I for example cast my F lets say heal, it auto casts D (flash) also... It's so annoying! How to fix this peeps?

replies.body:
That sounds like a strange issue, and even with a change in binding it's weird that both are happening unless it's fat fingered.  I suggest resetting your config in case any modifications or corruption is messing it up:

Log into the game client.
Navigate to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Config
Delete the file  named **game.cfg** and **persistedsettings.json**
Go into a custom game and verify that settings have saved properly.  Leave game to sync settings. 

Let me know if that helps.
